data.meta_description: Soar high with Frontier Airlines at the lowest fares when you fly from New York City, NY to 50+ destinations across the U.S. Book today for the best rates!
data.text:
Travel to 100 destinations and five international destinations when you book with Frontier Airlines on flights from New York City. Get free bags, seat selection, priority boarding, and refundable tickets with the WORKS℠, and make traveling with the whole family a breeze.

Flying from New York-LaGuardia Airport

LaGuardia Airport (LGA) is located in Queens, 14 km from midtown Manhattan. A major airport, LaGuardia has everything that you whole gaggle needs before they take flight. Plenty of restaurants, shops, Wi-Fi and lounges make sure you’re entertained.

Leaving New York City

New York City is full of public transportation options to reach the airport. Take the underground train or public bus depending on your location. For door-to-door service, hire a taxi or airport shuttle, but beware of the traffic. The easiest part will be booking with Frontier Airlines on all your flights from New York City – we’ll save you time and money!
